name: Pirate Plunder (itch)
description:
A top down shooter with pirate ships, endless waves and fun this is our first game we ever made so expect it to be bad! We will one day come back to this and update it though!


Things that we didnt' add (YET): no respawn button so just close the application and relaunch it if you die, you also have to hit the back of the ships for it to count!

Small ship: 5 shots
U: 5 shots
Medium: 10 shots
Big boi: 17 shots
